QuestData.Title: Through the Old Roads
QuestData.Description:
Lady Waycrest has entrusted me with securing the town of Falconhurst and the services of Master Alchemist Ashton who lives there. However, I have found out no one has heard from Falconhurst in some time.
The skies above the forest are impassable, so we must travel the old roads through Drust ruins in the mountains. A small capable party has a better chance to bypass the growing forces of the witches and to help secure Master Alchemist Ashton.
To that end, I ask you to assist me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Inquisitor Cleardawn at Gol Osigr.
QuestData.RewardText: Something has disturbed the spirits here.$b$bThe spirits of the departed still fight with constructs and the shambling dead. $b$bOur goal is Falconhurst, but a quick investigation of this area might help us fight our foes better.
